com.sessionm.api
Interface User

public interface User

User information. Provides information about such properties as 'opt-out' status, number of unclaimed achievement and other relevant information.

Method Summary

          Returns mPoints points balance.

          Returns 'opt-out' status of the user.

          Sets 'opt-out' status of the user.
